shibboleth.data

Class HashMapStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • shibboleth.data.HashMapStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource, DataStore

    public class HashMapStore
extends Object
implements DataStore
    A Github Data Store that stores Github objects in HashMaps and Lists.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse

        Retrieve a user from the source

        Parameters:
        login - the name of the user, e.g. octocat.
        Returns:

      • getContributions

        public List<Contribution> getContributions(String reponame,
                                  boolean ensureAll)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Retrieve all Contributions for a repo.
        Specified by:
        getContributions in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        reponame - The repo to retrieve contributions to.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. See also the getUser method.
        Returns:
        The contributions for the given repo.

      • getRepo

        public Repo getRepo(String reponame)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Retrieve a repo from the source.
        Specified by:
        getRepo in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        reponame - The full name of the repo, e.g. octocat/HelloWorld.
        Returns:
        The repo if the repo is found in this source, null otherwise.

      • getRepos

        public List<Repo> getRepos(String username,
                  RepoFilter filter,
                  boolean ensureAll)
        Description copied from interface: DataSource
        Retrieve all repos which user owns. These are not all repos which the user contributed to!
        Specified by:
        getRepos in interface DataSource
        Parameters:
        username - The user to retrieve repos for.
        filter - A filter to filter which repos should be retrieved.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. This option is useful for caches: If it is fine to return only the appropriate repos which are currently in the cache ensureAll should be false, otherwise ensureAll should be true, and the cache is bypassed.
        Returns:
        The repos of the user, null if we cannot ensure that the entire set of repos which the user owns will be returned.

      • deleteRepo

        public int deleteRepo(String fullRepoName)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Remove all repos with the given repo name. Also the contribtutions of this repo are removed.
        Specified by:
        deleteRepo in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        fullRepoName - The name of the repo
        Returns:
        The number of deleted items.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • storedAllContributionsForRepo

        public void storedAllContributionsForRepo(String repo,
                                 boolean stored)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Method to indicate whether all contribution to the given repo have been saved in this data store. This enables DataSource.getContributions(String, boolean) to return a non null result if we call this function with ensureAll set to true.
        Specified by:
        storedAllContributionsForRepo in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        repo - The repo
        stored - Indicates whether all contributions have been saved or not.

      • storedAllContributionsByUser

        public void storedAllContributionsByUser(String user,
                                boolean stored)
        Description copied from interface: DataStore
        Method to indicate whether all contribution by the given user have been saved in this data store. This enables DataSource.getRepos(String, RepoFilter, boolean) to return a non null result if we call this function with ensureAll set to true.
        Specified by:
        storedAllContributionsByUser in interface DataStore
        Parameters:
        user - The user
        stored - Indicates whether all related contributions have been saved

        public static void main(String[] args)
